name: com.s8l.plugins.odin
description:
Odin Inspector and Serializer. 
Inspector extension, exposes more types for modification in inspector
Check https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/odin-inspector-and-serializer-89041 
for more info.

Check README.md before using the plugin.

Changelog:
 3.0.12 Added Button under Tools/Odin Inspector/Custom to update the generated dll
 3.0.8 Updated odin version with automatic setup (updating from 2.x might require manual setup) and Build and Run fix. Odin version is still 3.0.7
 2.1.18: Odin version is still 2.1.12.

samples.description: Import this into the project so that you have link.xml and AOTGenerationConfig.asset required for a Build
